oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait of Lena A. Warner
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: medicine; nursing; Warner, Lena Angevine; 1940s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "This portrait of Mrs. Lena A. Warner, by Jascha Shaffran, hangs in John Gaston Nursing Home, which she founded when the hospital was still Memphis General Hospital."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Original Portrait by Jascha Shaffran
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Memphis - Biography - Warner, Mrs. Lena A.
